comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
After the swearing in of the new Council of Ministers, at Government House, Dar es Salaam,
 3 September 1960. From left to right:
Front row: Chief Abdullah S Fundikira, Minister for Lands and Surveys,
                  Mr M J Davies, Minister for Information Services,
                  Mr Julius K Nyerere, Chief Minister,
                  H E Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, Governor  of Tanganyika,
                  Mr J S R Cole, QC, Attorney-General,
                  Sir Ernest Vasey, KBE, CMG, Minister for Finance,
                  Mr Derek N M Bryceson, Minister for Health and Labour,
 Back Row: Mr Oscar Kambona, Minister for Education, 
                  Mr Paul Bomani, Minister for Agriculture and Co-operative Development,
                  Mr George Kahama, Minister for Home Affairs,   
                  Mr Amir Jamal, Minister for Communications and Works,
                  Mr Nsilo Swai, Minister for Commerce and Industry, 
                  Mr Rashidi Kawawa, Minister for Local Government and Housing.
